Text:
Norton Internet Security 2008 is OK, but Kaspersky and NOD32 are still better.  

The 2007 version was a complete failure at its job.  Bloated, slows the fastest of machines, and still not the best A/V solution.  What a joke.  

Norton 2008 at least made somewhat of a comeback, even if it isn't the best, its a major leap in the right direction.  The 2007 version was terrible.
